text: Hi everyone, I’m trying to figure out whether there’s documentation for the methods available client side, like HubSpot.utils.etc
Trying to find a way to categorise pages
In what way are you categorizing pages?

Let’s say the business has 2 verticals, A and B.  Ideally, the user creating the content can indicate the category/vertical of the content via the post/page creation UI. I can see that they’re able to add posts and pages to ‘Campaigns’. So I was trying to access the post’s campaign.
so far digging around I don’t think this is possible
I found some  data in hsVars, and some methods in HubSpot.utils, but still can’t work out whether what I want to do is possible
best solution I’ve come up with so far is get the person publishing the content to add a meta tag to the head of each post in the advanced section, not ideal but I guess it will work
